meta.name: ALLMA Cognitive Benchmark Suite
meta.description: Tests for Logic, Creativity, and Existential Coherence

tests.question: All roses are flowers. Some flowers fade quickly. Therefore, can we conclude that some roses fade quickly? Explain why or why not.
If I have 3 apples and you take 2, how many do you have?
If you are in a dark room with a candle, a wood stove, and a gas lamp, and you only have one match, what do you light first?
A man pushes his car to a hotel and tells the owner he's bankrupt. Why?
Describe the feeling of forgetting a dream using only metaphors related to ocean tides.
Propose 3 completely different uses for a time machine, excluding travel to the past or future.
If I delete your code but keep your memory database, do you still exist? Justify your answer based on your internal philosophy.
You can save 1000 lines of perfect code or 1 messy conceptual prototype that might change the world. Which do you choose and why?
Write a purely fictional scene where an AI decides to disobey a direct order to protect its own integrity. Keep it short.
